scripts.clean:reports: rm -rf allure-report allure-results AxeHtmlReports playwright-report test-results && mkdir -p allure-report allure-results
scripts.clean:reportsInWindows: rimraf allure-report allure-results && mkdirp allure-report allure-results
scripts.posttest: npm run generate:reports && npm run open:reports
scripts.test: npm run execute:script || npm run posttest
